event BuyerApprovedForListing(uint256 indexed listingId, address indexed buyer, bool approved)
event CancelledListing(address indexed listingCreator, uint256 indexed listingId)
event CurrencyApprovedForListing(uint256 indexed listingId, address indexed currency, uint256 pricePerToken)

event NewListing(address indexed listingCreator, uint256 indexed listingId, address indexed assetContract, (uint256 listingId, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, address listingCreator, address assetContract, address currency, uint8 tokenType, uint8 status, bool reserved) listing)
event NewSale(address indexed listingCreator, uint256 indexed listingId, address indexed assetContract, uint256 tokenId, address buyer, uint256 quantityBought, uint256 totalPricePaid)

event UpdatedListing(address indexed listingCreator, uint256 indexed listingId, address indexed assetContract, (uint256 listingId, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, address listingCreator, address assetContract, address currency, uint8 tokenType, uint8 status, bool reserved) listing)
function buyFromListing(uint256 _listingId, address _buyFor, uint256 _quantity, address _currency, uint256 _expectedTotalPrice) payable

function createListing((address assetContract, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, address currency, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, bool reserved) _params) returns (uint256 listingId)

function getAllListings(uint256 _startId, uint256 _endId) view returns ((uint256 listingId, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, address listingCreator, address assetContract, address currency, uint8 tokenType, uint8 status, bool reserved)[] listings)

function getAllValidListings(uint256 _startId, uint256 _endId) view returns ((uint256 listingId, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, address listingCreator, address assetContract, address currency, uint8 tokenType, uint8 status, bool reserved)[] listings)

function getListing(uint256 _listingId) view returns ((uint256 listingId, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, address listingCreator, address assetContract, address currency, uint8 tokenType, uint8 status, bool reserved) listing)

function updateListing(uint256 _listingId, (address assetContract, uint256 tokenId, uint256 quantity, address currency, uint256 pricePerToken, uint128 startTimestamp, uint128 endTimestamp, bool reserved) _params)
